game.title: Elysium Lost
game.synopsis: Elysium Lost is a science fiction adventure game set on a deserted alien planet. The player is a part of a space expedition team who loses their way and crash lands on the mysterious planet. The goal is to survive and find a way back home.
game.beginning: The game starts with the player waking up in a crashed spaceship, memories hazy, and having no idea about their location. The story unfolds with them exploring the spaceship, collecting findings and clues that hint towards a disastrous accident that resulted in the crash.
game.ending: After unraveling many secrets, fighting alien monsters and surviving the harsh conditions of the planet, the player manages to fix an old abandoned alien spacecraft. In the closing scenes, they blast off from the planet into the unknown space, praying to find a way back home.
